tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Aesthetic Dentistry,Cosmetic/ Aesthetic Dentistry,Conservative Dentistry,Dental Fillings,
review: Dr. Shravan has completely changed the way I smile. I’m so glad I paid him a visit because I had a lot of past work on my teeth which needed correction. He was to the point and explained each and everything very well that was needed to be done. I’m so glad I trusted him with my teeth because he has done marvelous work on them and made me more confident with my smile. He even changed my outlook on dentistry and in general dental health and the importance of it. This doctor will take no shortcuts and do the work as precisely as he can. Thank you very much, Dr. Shravan.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shravan was so soft spoken & friendly. He explained to me about the situation of my cavity in such a simple way that I was so satisfied & calm before he even started the procedure. He has light hands & so good attitude. I’m really happy with the treatment.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The experience with Dr. Shravan was extremely fruitful. He completed my tooth filling, surgical tooth extraction within the estimated time period and also did great work with one of my front tooth. Extremely clean and great space. Friendly staff. Would definitely recommend him!
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Chawla is a perfectionist. I like the way he keeps sharing what he’s doing, while treating the patient. Follow up is always done by contacting patient. Reminder call to the patient having appointment. 
Very gentle while actually working on the patient. Thus creating a trust in him. I’m one of his oldest patients and wish to continue with Dr. Chawla in future too.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was hesitant to get a dental treatment done during Covid for obvious reasons. But if there's one thing Dr Shravan is known for, is his knack for cleanliness and hygiene. And I know this since we were in Med School together. Hence I felt totally safe to go to his clinic which had all the hygiene protocols in place. And the treatment with him has always been good since I've been going to him for the past 6 years
reply_text: Thank you so much for trusting us

review: My crown had come off while having some sticky item. Dr. Shravan was kind enough to give me an appointment for the very next day. I did not have to wait for more than 10 minutes in a comfortable clinic. Dr. Shravan explained to me my problem in detail and fixed my crown in no time. He also prescribed certain remedies to avoid the problem in future. Thank you, Dr. Shravan for your treatment.
reply_text: Always a pleasure. Please take care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The Doctor was very friendly. He explained very nicely and treated the problem very efficiently. He also told us about the after-care to be taken. He is very professional in his Work. I wish him ‘All The Best’ in his Practice as well as his Life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
The most patient & gentle dentist I have been to. I was petrified on day 1, but got so much confidence in the doc & got so comfortable, that the next two visits were a breeze. 

Dr. Shravan is an artist & one of the best thing about him is that he explains everything in detail, so you know exactly what it happening at every stage.. and of course, post my treatment, I smile much more & my smile has become much wider... 

For all you people who are scared of dentists & needles, you will be a different person after just the 1st sitting at Bay Dental.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words
